data.title: Boring but... boring
data.statement: You must output the absolute difference between the number of consonants and vowels.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn: Eulogia, eunomia, eutopia, miaoued, moineau. Looks strange, isn't it?

testCases.testIn: Comment by Andriamanitra: Needs more test cases for reverse mode

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: Maybe change the first test case to be a single word only so players don't waste time thinking it's something to do with the number of words?
